mapper.insert: insert into restaurant (rid, rpassword, rname, rtitle, raddress, rtel, rcategory, rdate) values (#{rid}, #{rpassword}, #{rname}, #{rtitle}, #{raddress}, #{rtel}, #{rcategory}, NOW())
mapper.select: select rid, rpassword, rname, rtitle, raddress, rtel, rcategory, rdate from restaurant where rid = #{rid}
select rid, rpassword, rname, rtitle, raddress, rtel, rcategory, rdate from restaurant order by rtel desc limit #{startIndex1}, #{rowsPerPage1}
select rno, rid, rpassword, rname, rtitle, raddress, rtel, rcategory, rdate from restaurant where rno=#{rno}
select rno, rid, rpassword, rname, rtitle, raddress, rtel, rcategory, rdate from restaurant where raddress like CONCAT('%',#{siNm},'%') and raddress like CONCAT('%',#{emdNm},'%')
select rno from restaurant where rid=#{rid}
select count(*) from restaurant where rdate = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
select count(*) from restaurant where rdate = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
select count(*) from restaurant where rdate = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 2 DAY;
